text: Parental Guidance (previously titled Us & Them) is a 2012 American family- comedy movie starring Billy Crystal, Bette Midler, Marisa Tomei, and Tom Everett Scott and directed by Andy Fickman. It was released on December 25, 2012. Category:English-language movies Category:2012 comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies about families
title: Parental Guidance (movie)
